title: Fire alarm and sprinkler system inspection certificates
dataVerified: Building address, system type, inspector/company, inspection date, test results
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake fire system certificates. Domain binding verifies fire protection company. NFPA 25/72 compliance. Fire marshal verification. Building occupancy requirement. Prevents life safety fraud.
